description:
"From now on I`ll do everything I can for you with all my heart." That`s what the new girl at school said to me! Finally a kind girl appears before me… Yeah, right!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Before I Knew It, My Tragedy Had Already Begun
Ore non Higeki wa Kizuku to Hajimatteru
مأساتي قد بدأت، قبل أن أدرك ذلك حتى
俺の悲劇は気づくと始まってる
